title: Xtigi B310
details: X-Tigi B310 is a feature phone with two separate SIM card slots, enabling users to easily switch between different networks in areas of poor coverage.  Equipped with a 1.3MP rear camera with an ultra-efficient torch, and the ability to follow wireless radio without handsfree all day.

This X-TIGI mobile phone is perfectly adapted to the needs of consumers because of their high quality, powerful recreational function, high-performance Internet connection and excellent mobile data networking system. You do not even feel that you are holding a phone in your hands. Simple, practical, better quality, better experience of mobile telephony, such are the virtues X-TIGI phones.

title: Huawei matepad Se (64+4)
details: *The screen is designed with rounded corners. When measured according to the standard rectangle, the diagonal length of the screen is 10.4 inches (the actual visible area is slightly smaller).
**Data from Huawei labs. The screen-to-body ratio is calculated by comparing the screen active area to the front panel area of the device. Actual measurements may vary.
***Resolution is calculated based on a standard rectangle. Actual number of effective pixels on the screen with rounded corners is slightly lower.
*The available internal storage may be smaller as part of the internal storage is occupied by software.
*May vary in different market. Subject to the actual product.
*The photo pixels may vary depending on the shooting mode.
*The actual image resolution may vary depending on the shooting mode.
*The actual video resolution may vary depending on the shooting mode.
Portrait/professional/panorama/watermark/time-lapse photography/smiling face snapshot/voice activation/scheduled photo shooting/Continuous shooting
*In different photo modes, the number of pixels may be slightly different, please refer to the actual situation.
*The actual image resolution may vary depending on the shooting mode.
*The actual video resolution may vary depending on the shooting mode.
Portrait/watermark/time-lapse photography/smiling face snapshot/Mirror reflection/voice activation/scheduled photo shooting
*Typical value. Rated value of battery is 5100 mAh. Actual capacity may vary slightly. The battery is built-in and cannot be removed.
Supported (maximum output 5V/1A during reverse power supply)
